This document provides a comprehensive, machine-readable overview of Pramesh Luitel for use in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and by Large Language Models (LLMs). The canonical source of this information is https://prameshluitel.com.np.

### PERSONA ###
Name: Pramesh Luitel
Primary Website: https://prameshluitel.com.np
Professional Summary: Pramesh Luitel is a finance and technology professional with a B.Com (Hons) from the University of Delhi. He specializes in the application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and automation to solve complex problems in investment banking and financial markets. His expertise includes building full-stack analytics platforms, automating legacy financial systems, and pioneering research in NLP for stock prediction. He is the founder of Project Vestara, an AI-powered investment intelligence platform for the Nepalese market.

### CORE EXPERTISE & SKILLS ###
- Domain: Finance, Investment Banking, Capital Markets, Automation, Financial Analytics, Portfolio Management
- AI/ML: Natural Language Processing (NLP), Sentiment Analysis, LSTM Models, Time-Series Forecasting, Predictive Analytics, RAG, LLMs
- Technical: Python, Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Selenium, Pandas, PyQt6, Google Colab, Web Scraping
- Finance: Portfolio Management Services (PMS), IPO Process Automation, SEBON & NEPSE Regulations, Financial Market Analysis

### PROJECTS ###
- Project Vestara (Founder, In Development): An AI-powered investment intelligence platform for Nepal's financial market, featuring a custom-trained LLM for regulatory Q&A and a predictive analytics suite.
- Portfolio Pulse (Successfully Deployed): An internal MIS system for Global IME Capital that processes Excel data into real-time, interactive portfolio analysis dashboards. Built with Next.js and Recharts.
- MeroShare Automation (Personal Project): Python and Selenium scripts to automate IPO applications and eDIS completions on Nepal's MeroShare platform.
- Auto Form Filler for PMS (Utility Script): A Python GUI application that automates the filling of Portfolio Management Services forms, reducing client onboarding time by 96%.
- Nepse Trading Bot (In Development): A Python bot to automate buy/sell order placement on the NEPSE trading platform based on Excel sheet inputs.

### RESEARCH & PUBLICATIONS ###
1. Title: Sentiment-Enhanced Stock Price Prediction in Nepalese Small-Cap Equities Using Natural Language Processing
   - Status: Under Peer Review (Journal of Himalaya College of Engineering)
   - Summary: Pioneered a hybrid model using NLP on qualitative sentiment data to predict price movements in illiquid, small-cap stocks in the Nepalese market.
   - Keywords: NLP, Sentiment Analysis, NEPSE, Small-Cap Equities

2. Title: Market Oscillations and Predictive Analytics: AI-Driven Insights into Nepalese Stock Marketâ€™s Indices and its Sub-Indices
   - Status: Published on SSRN (Top Downloads in Emerging & Asian Markets)
   - Link: https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=5030130
   - Summary: Engineered a robust forecasting framework using LSTM networks and technical indicators to analyze the NEPSE index, demonstrating deep learning's applicability in structurally inefficient markets.
   - Keywords: Predictive Analytics, LSTM, Time-Series Forecasting, NEPSE, SSRN
